parsing_result:
# MF Assist

Choose how focus is displayed in manual focus mode (page 94).

| Option                        | Description                                                                 |
|-------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHT          | The camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level. |
| FOCUS METER                   | A needle indicates whether focus is in front of or behind the subject.      |
| FOCUS METER + PEAK HIGHLIGHT  | Focus is indicated by both a meter and peak highlights.                     |
| OFF                           | Focus is displayed normally (focus peaking and the focus meter are not available). |

## Focus Check

Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (page 156).

## Instant AF Setting

This item is also found in the photo menus (page 157). Changes to one apply to the other.

> Instant AF is disabled during movie recording. Use instant AF to focus before recording begins.
